name: 20 Seconds To Survive (Awkwardstudios)
description:
WASD to Move

Left Mouse Button or Spacebar to Attack

M to to turn Music on/off

The goal is to survive for 20 Seconds with a random weapon

Possible weapons are

  • Pistol
  • Sword
  • Shotgun
  • Flamethrower

The Play option gives all weapon choices, Easy gets Shotgun or Flamethrower, Normal gets Shotgun or Sword, and Hard gets Pistol or Sword.

the entire game was made in approximately 3 days give or take a few hours
